TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CimType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the possible CIM types for properties, *qualifiers*, or method parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Boolean = int32(11)

Docs.summary: A Boolean. This value maps to the <xref:System.Boolean> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Char16 = int32(103)

Docs.summary: A 16-bit character. This value maps to the <xref:System.Char> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType DateTime = int32(101)

Docs.summary: A date or time value, represented in a string in DMTF date/time format: *yyyymmddHHMMSS.mmmmmmsUUU*, where *yyyymmdd* is the date in year/month/day; *HHMMSS* is the time in hours/minutes/seconds; *mmmmmm* is the number of microseconds in 6 digits; and *sUUU* is a sign (+ or -) and a 3-digit UTC offset. This value maps to the <xref:System.DateTime> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Object = int32(13)

Docs.summary: An embedded object. Note that embedded objects differ from references in that the embedded object does not have a path and its lifetime is identical to the lifetime of the containing object. This value maps to the <xref:System.Object> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Real32 = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A floating-point 32-bit number. This value maps to the <xref:System.Single> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Real64 = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A floating point 64-bit number. This value maps to the <xref:System.Double> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType Reference = int32(102)

Docs.summary: A reference to another object. This is represented by a string containing the path to the referenced object. This value maps to the <xref:System.Int16> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType SInt16 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A signed 16-bit integer. This value maps to the <xref:System.Int16> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType SInt32 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A signed 32-bit integer. This value maps to the <xref:System.Int32> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType SInt64 = int32(20)

Docs.summary: A signed 64-bit integer. This value maps to the <xref:System.Int64> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType SInt8 = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A signed 8-bit integer. This value maps to the <xref:System.SByte> type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.CimType String = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A string. This value maps to the <xref:System.String> type.
